Properties.Name: TableRelation
CalcFormula
Properties.Value: sum("Compensation Line CZC"."Ledg. Entry Rem. Amt. (LCY)" where("Compensation No." = field("No.")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value: sum("Compensation Line CZC"."Amount (LCY)" where("Compensation No." = field("No.")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value: sum("Compensation Line CZC"."Amount (LCY)" where("Compensation No." = field("No."), "Amount (LCY)" = filter(> 0)))

Properties.Name: TableRelation
Properties.Value:
if ("Source Type" = const(Customer)) Customer."No." else
            if ("Source Type" = const(Vendor)) Vendor."No."

Properties.Name: TableRelation
Properties.Value:
if ("Source Type" = const(Customer)) "Customer Posting Group" else
            if ("Source Type" = const(Vendor)) "Vendor Posting Group"

Properties.Name: TableRelation
Properties.Value:
if ("Source Type" = const(Customer)) "Cust. Ledger Entry"."Entry No." where(Open = const(true)) else
            if ("Source Type" = const(Vendor)) "Vendor Ledger Entry"."Entry No." where(Open = const(true))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value: Lookup(AllObjWithCaption."Object Caption" where("Object Type" = const(Report), "Object ID" = field("Report ID")))

Properties.Name: TableRelation
Properties.Value:
if ("Company Type" = const(Customer)) Customer else
            if ("Company Type" = const(Vendor)) Vendor

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value: sum("Posted Compensation Line CZC"."Ledg. Entry Rem. Amt. (LCY)" where("Compensation No." = field("No.")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value: sum("Posted Compensation Line CZC"."Amount (LCY)" where("Compensation No." = field("No.")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value: sum("Posted Compensation Line CZC"."Amount (LCY)" where("Compensation No." = field("No."), "Amount (LCY)" = filter(> 0)))

Properties.Name: TableRelation
Properties.Value:
if ("Source Type" = const(Customer)) Customer."No." else
            if ("Source Type" = const(Vendor)) Vendor."No."

Properties.Name: TableRelation
Properties.Value:
if ("Source Type" = const(Customer)) "Customer Posting Group" else
            if ("Source Type" = const(Vendor)) "Vendor Posting Group"

Properties.Name: TableRelation
Properties.Value:
if ("Source Type" = const(Customer)) "Cust. Ledger Entry"."Entry No." else
            if ("Source Type" = const(Vendor)) "Vendor Ledger Entry"."Entry No."
